Languages.string: understands Common and Elvish but can't speak

MonsterTrait.Name: Dive Attack
MonsterTrait.Text: If the peryton is flying and dives at least 30 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 9 (2d8) damage to the target.

MonsterTrait.Name: Flyby
MonsterTrait.Text: The peryton doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Sight and Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The peryton has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The peryton makes one gore attack and one talon attack.

MonsterAction.Name: Gore
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Talons
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.
